name: Cube Conquest for Merge Cube
description:
PLEASE NOTE: This app requires a Merge Cube and a smartphone or a tablet to play. To find out how to get a Merge Cube and learn more, visit our website at: https://www.MergeCube.com.

Alien bugs are invading the planet, and you must stop them before they eat the planet’s core! Set up defenses on all sides to destroy them at every turn.

Cube Conquest is a new augmented reality twist on the tower defense genre, only for Merge Cube. Your mining colony is under attack from invading alien bugs. As they crawl around all 6 sides of the cube, you’ll need to set up defensive towers to destroy them before they can eat your planet core.

Balance your strategy between building towers to defend against bugs and building mining towers to gather minerals from the planet. Smart economic management and careful defensive tower placements will lead you to victory in this fast paced strategy game.

Features
Play on All 6 Sides of MERGE Cube
18 Challenging Levels
3 Beautiful Planets (Desert, Ice, Lava)
Devastating Towers with Multiple Upgrades
Gross Bugs!
Intense Visual Effects

Only for Merge Cube.

As seen on VentureBeat, Wired, Wareable, Huffington Post, and more.

“Kids are gonna love this” - Hugh Langley, Wareable

“The coolest surprise from CES.” - Russell Holly

“The [Merge Cube] stole my heart at Toy Fair 2017.” - Dan Nessell, Huffington Post

HOW TO PLAY IN MOBILE/PHONE MODE (Without VR/AR Goggles)
-Launch the app
-Be sure to allow camera and photo access
-Enter your activation code (found inside the cube packaging)
-Enter an adult’s email address to create an account
-Select Mobile/Phone Mode
-Play the tutorial within the app
-Make sure the cube is in your device camera view at all times

HOW TO PLAY IN MERGE/VR MODE
-Launch the app
-Be sure to allow camera and photo access
-Enter your activation code (found inside the cube packaging)
-Enter an adult’s email address to create an account
-Select VR/Merge Mode
-Place your smartphone in your VR/AR goggles
-Play the tutorial within the app
-Make sure the cube is in your device camera view at all times

If you have any questions or suggestions, we would love to hear from you! Contact us at any time at support@MergeVR.com.
